name: Spectr (virtualchild)
description:
Spectr is a text exploration game about a tagger and house slated for demolition at dawn. It functions through a mechanic of repetition, so you are encouraged to hit "Play Again" twice. Each time you press "Play Again", please play the music file related to each level -- Level 1 for the first playthrough, Level 2 for the second, and Level 3 for the third. We hope you enjoy our queerly haunted game!

Anna & Eden
